title: Must Read: Linda Evangelista Covers 'Harper's Bazaar', Mytheresa Finalizes Yoox Net-a-Porter Acquisition
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Thursday. Linda Evangelista is Harper's Bazaar's May 2025 cover star. Photographed by Anthony Seklaoui and styled by Carlos Nazario, Evangelista wears a Givenchy by Sarah Burton belted trench with a Tiffany & Co. Elsa Peretti ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
